member.name: M:CacheCow.Common.CacheKey.#ctor(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.String)
member.param: value of the headers as in the request. Only those values whose named defined in VaryByHeader must be passed

route pattern for the URI. by default it is the same but in some cases it could be different. For example /api/cars/fastest and /api/cars/mostExpensive can share tha pattern /api/cars/* This will be used at the time of cache invalidation.

member.name: M:CacheCow.Common.Helpers.HttpHeadersExtensions.Parse(System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpHeaders,System.String)
member.param: CR-LF separated headers as specified in HTTP spec

member.name: M:CacheCow.Common.Helpers.HttpHeadersExtensions.ExtractHeadersValues(System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpRequestHeaders,System.String[])
member.summary: Extracts all headers provided. Does a case-insensitive selection.

member.name: T:CacheCow.Common.IEntityTagStore
member.summary:
This is an interface representing an ETag store acting similar to a dictionary. storing and retriving ETags.
In a single-server scenario, this could be an in-memory disctionary implementation while in a server farm, this will be a persistent store.
